title: Academics
description: Design and manage programs, courses, and curricula (MoEYS/IB/Cambridge ready) with multi-campus and multi-language (Khmer/English/Chinese) support.

title: Admissions & Enrollment
description: Online applications, lead tracking, document collection, and automated offers with seat management and waitlists.

title: Messaging & Communication
description: Email/SMS/Push announcements with segments (class, grade, campus) and delivery reports.

title: LMS & Social Learning
description: Class discussions, resources, assignments, and submissions with course-level collaboration.

title: Administration
description: Bulk import/export, module personalization, permissions/roles, and audit logs across campuses.

title: Students & Parents Portal
description: Unified portal for schedules, attendance, grades, invoices, and notifications.

title: Teachers & Staff Portal
description: Timetables, attendance, gradebook, assessments, and class communications with workflow approvals.

title: Assessment, Gradebook & Transcripts
description: Rubrics, percentages, GPA, CCE, custom transcript templates, and moderation tools.

title: Fees, Billing & Payments
description: Invoices, discounts/scholarships, payment plans, and online payment gateways.

title: Attendance & Biometrics
description: Daily/period attendance, device integrations (e.g., ZKTeco/Hikvision), and instant absence alerts.

title: Timetable & Scheduling
description: Automated timetable generation, room allocation, and clash detection.

title: Reporting & Analytics
description: Standard reports, custom report builder, and trend dashboards for academics and operations.

title: Apps & Integrations
description: Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, payment gateways, and open API for custom integrations.

title: Mobile Apps
description: iOS and Android apps for students, parents, and staff with push notifications.

title: Health Records
description: Student medical profiles, auto BMI, documentation, and behaviour analytics linkage.

title: Data Security, SSO & Compliance
description: SAML/Google/Microsoft SSO, audit trails, backups, and MoEYS compliance options.

title: Support & Onboarding
description: In-app chat/email support, onboarding assistance, migration help, and priority SLA.
